label: ProductionFacility
comment: A man made physical structure, such as a building, in which something is produced.

datatypeProperties.comment: The completion date of this production facility.
The construction date for this production facility.
The digital platform assigned identifier for this production facility.
The code specifying the function of this production facility.
A reference to a physical location or place.
A facility production unit related to this referenced location.
The renovation date of this production facility.
The code specifying the type of roof, such as a glass roof, for this production facility.
A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence about the identity of an animal or a batch of animals.
The process of certifying that a certain animal has met performance and quality assurance requirements, or qualification requirements as stipulated in regulations.
The process of certifying organizational performance or qualification requirements as stipulated in regulations.
A production process specified for this product batch.
The process of certifying that a process has met performance and quality assurance tests, or qualification requirements.
A piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence that a product batch has met required criteria.
The process of certifying that a certain product batch has passed performance and quality assurance tests, or qualification requirements stipulated in regulations.
The process of certifying that a certain product has passed performance and quality assurance tests, or qualification requirements stipulated in regulations.
A production facility subordinate to this production facility.

referencedBy.comment: A dedicated production facility for this production unit.
A production facility specified for this production process.
A production facility subordinate to this production facility.
